citeinfo.title: Correctional Facilities in Virginia
citeinfo.othercit: Initial information used was originally generated from EcoMaps. The file used was the State Lands Coverage from 1993 which had polygons outlining state facilities. 2007 update was based on data from the VDOC, Federal BOP and VDJJ websites.

descript.abstract: This dataset represents both adult and juvenile correctional facilities throughout Virginia. The adult correctional facilities include information on male and female correctional facilities, work facilities, and mental treatment facilities run by Virginia Department of Corrections (VDOC). The juvenile correctional facilities include information on the correctional center and reception/diagnostic centers run by the Virginia Department of Juvenile Justice (VDJJ).
descript.purpose: The purpose of this data is to provide a geographic representation of the location of the current correctional facilities in Virginia.

attracc.attraccr: Accuracy of the ditigization and attributes was tested by comparing the facility locations on DRG's, DOQQ's, SPOT2000, and 2006-07 VBMP imagery.

dataqual.logic: These data are believed to be logically consistent, though no tests were performed.
dataqual.complete: The facility information is believed to be as complete as possible based upon information obtained from Virginia Department of Corrections and Juvenile Justice web pages.

horizpa.horizpar: The horizontal position accuracy meets 1:20,000 national map accuracy standards.

vertacc.vertaccr: No vertical accuracy tests were performed.

citeinfo.title: Virginia Department of Corrections
citeinfo.othercit: This metadata document describes the overall data set; information about the correctional facilities within each region can be found under the web pages listed below.

srcinfo.srccontr: The list of facilities was obtained from the Virginia Department of Corrections web page. Facilities were divided among four regions.

citeinfo.title: Virginia Department of Juvenile Justice
citeinfo.othercit: This metadata document describes the overall data set; information about the juvenile correctional facilities can be found under the web pages listed below.

srcinfo.srccontr: The list of facilities was obtained from the Virginia Department of Juvenile Justice web page. Facilities were divided among three regions.

citeinfo.title: Federal Bureau of Prisons
citeinfo.othercit: This metadata document describes the overall data set: information about the federal prisons and can be found under the web pages listed below.

srcinfo.srccontr: The list of facilities was obtained from the US Bureau of Prisons web page.
The facility locations were digitized on top of 2006-2007 Virginia Base Mapping Program orthophotography.

Previous versions of this dataset were compared to a Virginia Department of Correction facilities dataset prepared by the Virginia Geographic Information Network for the VDOC. Corrections were made as needed.

procstep.procdesc: The site location of each adult and juvenile correctional facility was orginally digitized using SPOT 2000, USGS Digital Orthophotos and USGS Digital Raster Graphics. Updates to the dataset were digitized using 2002 VBMP Orthophotography. The digitized point was chosen based upon the approximate location of the front door of the main facility on the property. The projection of the digitized data set is in Lambert Conformal Conic, allowing use of this information with other VEDP coverages. All of the digitizing was done utilizing ArcView.

The Virginia Geographic Information Network produced an updated version of the Virginia Department of Corrections Facilities based on inforamtion provided to them from the VDOC. This VGIN dataset was used to update those facilities in the VEDP Correctional Facilities dataset. Additionally, corrections and updates were made to the Juvenile and Federal facilities also included in the VEDP dataset. All attribute information was gathered from the official web pages for these facilities.

enttyp.enttypd: Point location for adult and juvenile correctional facilities and work centers

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Unique number assigned to each facility

attrdomv.udom: Numeric field with unique identifiers for each facility

attr.attrdef: Correctional Facility Name
Address
Address (P.O. Box)

State
Zip code
Phone number of facility
Fax number at facility
Person to contact at correctional facility
Title of contact person
Regional name of VDOC facilities located within a defined boundary based upon grouping of counties throughout the state

edom.edomvd: Western Regional coverage of correctional facilities, regional boundary defined by VDOC
Eastern Regional coverage of correctional facilities, regional boundary defined by VDOC
Central Regional coverage of correctional facilities, regional boundary defined by VDOC

attr.attrdef: Facility type (adult, juvenile, federal type, detention & deiversion)
VDOC Security level assigned to each facility
Date the facility opened
Average Daily Population at the facility for the adults and average yearly population for the juveniles
Special population information about inmates (parole violators, death row, etc)
Special Programs at each facility (substance abuse, classification facility, etc)
Additions, upgrades, or changes to facility or inmate population
Type of Virginia Correctional Enterprise (VCE) activities
Date the data was updated
Associated gender at each facility (male, female, or co-ed)

Correctional facilities where females are housed
Correctional facilities which house both males and females

attr.attrdef: Number of acres on which the facility was built
General comments about the facility
Secondary security level assiged to the correctional facilities
Group which has the ownership responsiblities over the facilities
Group which has the ownership responsiblities over the facilities

edom.edomvd: Group responsible for ownership of the correctional facility
Group responsible for ownership of the correctional facility

attr.attrdef: VCE center location (Virginia Correctional Enterprises)

edom.edomvd: Yes, facility has a VCE center on the property
No, facility does not have a VCE center on property

attr.attrdef: Canine training center for dogs and handlers, courses for bloodhounds, police service/patrol dogs, & narcotic dogs

edom.edomvd: Yes, canine training center on property
No, canine center not on property

overview.eaover: Attributes show contact and locational information as well as describe conditions at the facility.
overview.eadetcit: Attributes were user defined based on information gathered from VDOC and VDJJ web sites.

distinfo.distliab: Although all data referred to in this doucmentation have been used by the VEDP, no warranty, expressed or implied, is made by the VEDP as to the accuracy of the data. The act of distribution shall not constitute any such warranty, and no responsibility is assumed by the VEDP in the use of these data.
